software_patch.check: Ensure APT requires a recognized digital signature before installation
software_patch.recommendation: Run 'echo Acquire::AllowUnauthenticated "false"; > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/00secure' to enforce signature verification.

software_patch.check: Ensure APT removes outdated software components
software_patch.recommendation: Run 'echo APT::Periodic::Autoremove "1"; > /etc/apt/apt.conf.d/10periodic' to enable automatic removal.
